mapper.select: select input_warehouse_key, shop_code, shop_name, goods_code, goods_name, supplier_code,input_shop_code,input_shop_name, supplier_name, input_plan, input_price, input_actual, inventory_code, position_code, create_time, deadline_time, vehicle_code, status, type, shop_people_code, inventory_people_code, return_reason,is_deleted,return_num from input_warehouse order by input_warehouse_key

select input_warehouse_key, shop_code, shop_name, goods_code, goods_name, supplier_code,input_shop_code,input_shop_name, supplier_name, input_plan, input_price, input_actual, inventory_code, position_code, create_time, deadline_time, vehicle_code, status, type, shop_people_code, inventory_people_code, return_reason,is_deleted,return_num from input_warehouse where input_warehouse_key = #{inputWarehouseKey}
mapper.insert: insert into input_warehouse(input_warehouse_key,shop_code, shop_name, goods_code, goods_name, supplier_code,supplier_name,input_shop_code,input_shop_name, input_plan, input_price, input_actual, inventory_code, position_code, create_time, deadline_time, vehicle_code, status, type, shop_people_code, inventory_people_code, return_reason,is_deleted,return_num) values (#{inputWarehouseKey},#{shopCode}, #{shopName}, #{goodsCode}, #{goodsName}, #{supplierCode}, #{supplierName},#{inputShopCode},#{inputShopName}, #{inputPlan}, #{inputPrice}, #{inputActual}, #{inventoryCode}, #{positionCode}, #{createTime}, #{deadlineTime}, #{vehicleCode}, #{status}, #{type}, #{shopPeopleCode}, #{inventoryPeopleCode}, #{returnReason},#{isDeleted},#{returnNum})

(#{entity.shopCode}, #{entity.shopName}, #{entity.goodsCode}, #{entity.goodsName}, #{entity.supplierCode}, #{entity.supplierName},#{entity.inputShopCode},#{entity.inputShopName}, #{entity.inputPlan}, #{entity.inputPrice}, #{entity.inputActual}, #{entity.inventoryCode}, #{entity.positionCode}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.deadlineTime}, #{entity.vehicleCode}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.shopPeopleCode}, #{entity.inventoryPeopleCode}, #{entity.returnReason},#{entity.isDeleted},#{entity.returnNum})

insert into input_warehouse(shop_code, shop_name, goods_code, goods_name, supplier_code, supplier_name,input_shop_code,input_shop_name, input_plan, input_price, input_actual, inventory_code, position_code, create_time, deadline_time, vehicle_code, status, type, shop_people_code, inventory_people_code, return_reason,is_deleted,return_num) values
(#{entity.shopCode}, #{entity.shopName}, #{entity.goodsCode}, #{entity.goodsName}, #{entity.supplierCode}, #{entity.supplierName},#{entity.inputShopCode},#{entity.inputShopName}, #{entity.inputPlan}, #{entity.inputPrice}, #{entity.inputActual}, #{entity.inventoryCode}, #{entity.positionCode}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.deadlineTime}, #{entity.vehicleCode}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.shopPeopleCode}, #{entity.inventoryPeopleCode}, #{entity.returnReason},#{entity.isDeleted},#{entity.returnNum})
on duplicate key update shop_code = values(shop_code), shop_name = values(shop_name), goods_code = values(goods_code), goods_name = values(goods_name), supplier_code = values(supplier_code), supplier_name = values(supplier_name), input_shop_code = values(input_shop_code), input_shop_name = values(input_shop_name), input_plan = values(input_plan), input_price = values(input_price), input_actual = values(input_actual), inventory_code = values(inventory_code), position_code = values(position_code), create_time = values(create_time), deadline_time = values(deadline_time), vehicle_code = values(vehicle_code), status = values(status), type = values(type), shop_people_code = values(shop_people_code), inventory_people_code = values(inventory_people_code), return_reason = values(return_reason), is_deleted = values(is_deleted), return_num = values(return_num)
mapper.update:
update input_warehouse
shop_code = #{shopCode},
shop_name = #{shopName},
goods_code = #{goodsCode},
goods_name = #{goodsName},
supplier_code = #{supplierCode},
supplier_name = #{supplierName},
input_plan = #{inputPlan},
input_price = #{inputPrice},
input_actual = #{inputActual},
inventory_code = #{inventoryCode},
position_code = #{positionCode},
create_time = #{createTime},
deadline_time = #{deadlineTime},
vehicle_code = #{vehicleCode},
status = #{status},
type = #{type},
shop_people_code = #{shopPeopleCode},
inventory_people_code = #{inventoryPeopleCode},
return_reason = #{returnReason},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
return_num = #{returnNum},
input_shop_code = #{inputShopCode},
input_shop_name = #{inputShopName},
where input_warehouse_key = #{inputWarehouseKey}
